scripts.build:extension: tsc -b && vite build && npm run copy-extension-files
scripts.build:chrome: tsc -b && vite build && npm run copy-chrome-files
scripts.build:edge: tsc -b && vite build && npm run copy-edge-files
scripts.build:firefox: tsc -b && vite build && npm run copy-firefox-files
scripts.copy-extension-files: cp public/manifest.json public/popup.html public/popup.js public/background.js public/offscreen.html public/offscreen.js public/icon*.png dist/
scripts.copy-chrome-files: cp public/manifest.chrome.json dist/manifest.json && cp public/popup.html public/popup.js public/background.js public/offscreen.html public/offscreen.js public/icon*.png dist/
scripts.copy-edge-files: cp public/manifest.edge.json dist/manifest.json && cp public/popup.html public/popup.js public/background.js public/offscreen.html public/offscreen.js public/icon*.png dist/
scripts.copy-firefox-files: cp public/manifest.firefox.json dist/manifest.json && cp public/popup.html public/popup.js public/background.js public/icon*.png dist/
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && cd dist && zip -r ../tomato-chrome.zip .
scripts.package:edge: npm run build:edge && cd dist && zip -r ../tomato-edge.zip .
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && cd dist && zip -r ../tomato-firefox.zip .
